sentence.Network_en: Buck Mulligan frowned at the lather on his razorblade.
sentence.Network_cn: 勃克·穆利根朝着剃胡刀上的肥皂沫皱了皱眉.

sentence.Network_en: Buck Mulligan wiped again his razorblade.
sentence.Network_cn: 勃克·穆利根又揩了揩剃刀刃.

sentence.Network_en: Buck Mulligan wiped the razorblade neatly.
sentence.Network_cn: 勃克·穆利根干净利索地揩完剃胡刀.
